Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; top of rim glazed; exterior: band of dots between bands; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: For parallels, see British Museum 1924,1201.332. The number '63' is written in pencil on the sherd's exterior surface.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 21.1.10)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0977) (phase 2)
